贑字的基本解释

贑
gàn
同“赣”。

贑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gòng］
［《廣韻》古送切，去送，見。］
“赣1”的繁体字。
(1)赐给。
(2)姓。汉有赣遂。见《汉书·朱博传》。
[②]［gàn］
［《廣韻》古暗切，去勘，見。］
［《廣韻》古禫切，上感，見。］
“赣2”的繁体字。亦作“贑1”。
(1)水名。即江西省境内的赣江，又称赣水。东源贡水出武夷山脉，西源章水出大庾岭，在赣州市汇合后称赣江。曲折北流，纵贯全省。主流入鄱阳湖。
(2)江西省的简称。
[③]［zhuàng］
［《集韻》陟降切，去絳，知。］
通“戇1”。“赣3”的繁体字。亦作“贑2”。

贑字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　贑； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1212第40
【廣韻】古暗切，音紺。灨，亦作贑。縣名。章貢二水合流，因其處立縣，因以爲名，在南康郡。【集韻】或作?。又?。

贑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
贑字的起名意思

同“ 赣 ”，江西省的别称，因赣江纵贯本省而得名。

Wei
Basic explanation of words
Wei
gàn
Same as "Gan".
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gòng］
["Guangyun" ancient delivery cut, go to deliver, see you. ]
The traditional characters of "甘1".
(1) Give.
(2) Last name. Han has Gan Sui. See "Han Shu · Zhu Bo Biography".
[②]［gàn］
["Guangyun" ancient secret cut, go to survey, see. ]
["Guangyun" Gu Yu cut, feel on, see. ]
The traditional characters of "甘2". Also known as "贑1".
(1) Water name. It is the Ganjiang River in Jiangxi Province, also known as Ganshui. Dongyuan Gongshui flows out of the Wuyi Mountains, and Xiyuan Zhangshui flows out of Dayu Ridge. It is called Ganjiang after the confluence of Ganzhou City. The tortuous north flow runs through the province. The Lord flows into Poyang Lake.
(2) The abbreviation of Jiangxi Province.
[③]［zhuàng］
["Ji Yun" Zhi drop cut, go to Jiang, know. ]
Same as "戆1". Traditional Chinese characters for "甘3". Also known as "贑2".
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　贑; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1212 No. 40
[Guangyun] Ancient dark cut, cyanotic tone. Jiangxi is also used as a beneficiary. County name. The two rivers of Zhanggong merged, because it was located in a county, because of its name, it was in Nankang County. [Ji Yun] Or make?. also?.

Wei
Name meaning
Same as "Gan", another name for Jiangxi Province, named after the Ganjiang River runs through the province.
